pages.text: While their exact original purpose is unknown, Italian Greyhounds are believed to have originally been used as companion and small game hunting dogs.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these speedy dogs come in six different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in certain forests and badlands. They can more rarely be found in other forest and badlands biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
